00037 class ProgParameter: public PropertyValue
00038 {
00039     std::string m_description;
00040     bool m_hidden, m_set;
00041 public:
00048     ProgParameter();
00049     ProgParameter( const ProgParameter &ref );
00056     template<typename T> ProgParameter( const T &ref, bool needed = true ): PropertyValue( ref, needed ), m_hidden( false ), m_set( false ) {}
00063     bool parse( const isis::util::Type< std::string >& props );
00065     const std::string &description()const;
00067     void setDescription( const std::string &desc );
00072     template<typename T> operator const T()const {
00073         LOG_IF( empty(), isis::CoreDebug, isis::error ) << "Program parameters must not be empty. Please set it to any value.";
00074         return get()->cast_to<T>();
00075     }
00076     operator boost::scoped_ptr<_internal::TypeBase>::unspecified_bool_type()const;// implicit conversion to "bool" stolen from boost
00077 
00079     bool isSet()const;
00080 
00082     bool hidden()const;
00084     bool &hidden();

00091 class ParameterMap: public std::map<std::string, ProgParameter>
00092 {
00093     struct neededP {
00094         bool operator()( const_reference ref )const {return ref.second.needed();}
00095     };
00096     struct notneededP {
00097         bool operator()( const_reference ref )const {return !ref.second.needed();}
00098     };
00099     struct hiddenP {
00100         bool operator()( const_reference ref )const {return ref.second.hidden();}
00101     };
00102     template<class T> void printWithout() {
00103         std::map<key_type, mapped_type, key_compare> result( *this );
00104 
00105         for (
00106             iterator at = std::find_if( result.begin(), result.end(), T() );
00107             at != result.end();
00108             at = std::find_if( at, result.end(), hiddenP() )
00109         )
00110             result.erase( at++ );
00111 
00112         std::cout << result << std::endl;
00113     }
00114     bool parsed;
00115 public:
00117     ParameterMap();
00123     bool parse( int argc, char **argv );
00125     bool isComplete()const;
00126 };
00127 
00128 }

00131 namespace std
00132 {
00134 template<typename charT, typename traits> basic_ostream<charT, traits>&
00135 operator<<( basic_ostream<charT, traits> &out, const isis::util::ProgParameter &s )
00136 {
00137     const std::string &desc = s.description();
00138 
00139     if ( ! desc.empty() ) {
00140         out << desc << ", ";
00141     }
00142 
00143     LOG_IF( s.empty(), isis::CoreDebug, isis::error ) << "Program parameters must not be empty. Please set it to any value.";
00144     assert( !s.empty() );
00145     out << "default=\"" << s.toString( false ) << "\", type=" << s->typeName();
00146 
00147     if ( s.needed() )out << " (needed)";
00148 
00149     return out;
00150 }
00151 }
